about.description:
Gmsh is a free 3D finite element grid generator with a build-in CAD
engine and post-processor. Its design goal is to provide a fast, light
and user-friendly meshing tool with parametric input and advanced
visualization capabilities. Gmsh is built around four modules:
geometry, mesh, solver and post-processing. The specification of any
input to these modules is done either interactively using the graphical
user interface or in ASCII text files using Gmsh's own scripting
language.
about.summary: A three-dimensional finite element mesh generator with built-in pre- and post-processing facilities

name: python-gmsh
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.17.8
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: python-gmsh
    version: 4.2.1
source:
    fn: gmsh-4.2.1-source.tgz
    patches:
        - fltk_config.patch
    sha256: 1f11481e68900dc256f88aaed18d03e93b416ba01e9e8c3dc3f6d59a211f0561
    url: http://gmsh.info/src/gmsh-4.2.1-source.tgz
build:
    noarch: python
    number: 3
    string: '3'
requirements:
    run:
        - gmsh >=4.2.1,<4.2.2.0a0
        - numpy
        - python
test:
    imports:
        - gmsh
about:
    description: 'Gmsh is a free 3D finite element grid generator with a build-in
        CAD

        engine and post-processor. Its design goal is to provide a fast, light

        and user-friendly meshing tool with parametric input and advanced

        visualization capabilities. Gmsh is built around four modules:

        geometry, mesh, solver and post-processing. The specification of any

        input to these modules is done either interactively using the graphical

        user interface or in ASCII text files using Gmsh''s own scripting

        language.

        '
    home: http://geuz.org/gmsh/
    license: GPL
    license_family: GPL
    license_file: /home/conda/recipe_root/LICENSE.txt
    summary: A three-dimensional finite element mesh generator with built-in pre-
        and post-processing facilities
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - guyer
        - isuruf
        - xywei
